Session IV

[Slides - html]

This 1.5h session complements the previous one by covering the following topics on spatial regression:

  • Diagnostics
  • Estimation
  • Software implementation(s)

Related readings

  • Le Gallo, J. (2013) Cross-Section Spatial Regression Models. In Fischer, M. M. and Nijkamp, P., editors, Handbook of Regional Science. Springer-Verlag Berlin Heidelberg
  • Pinkse, J. and Slade, M. The future of spatial econometrics. Journal of Regional Science, 50(1): 103-117.
  • Bivand, R.; Piras, G. (in press). Comparing Implementations of Estimation Methods for Spatial Econometrics. Forthcoming in Journal of Statistical Software
